title: Patrick Radden Keefe | Trump’s Flailing Response to the Coronavirus Outbreak: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump appointing Mike Pence to take charge of the response to the coronavirus outbreak and reassuring absolutely nobody.

Patrick Radden Keefe talks about the unique way he was inspired to write Say Nothing and naming a suspect in an unsolved murder case in the book. 

He then takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G just for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
